name: Angry Shark 3D. Attack Of Hungy Great White Terror on The Beach
name_original: Angry Shark 3D. Attack Of Hungy Great White Terror on The Beach
description:
Play the new Angry Shark Simulator and get to experience the wildlife at its finest.
For the first time, YOU get to be on the evil side, become a vicious blood thirsty SHARK. With all its terror, spread chaos on a beach full of innocent people.


Looking to experience the underwater thrills, then you have come to the right place! Swim around and rule the seas like a fierce shark.

How to Play:-
- Use the joystick to move around the game
- Tap right button to jump
